title: selva niraivu
sahitya:
selva niraivu vENDum inda jagattinilE inburai-
ANDum aruTselva niraivu vENDum


anupallavi

  kalvi selvam kalaiyin selvam kavithai selvam vENDum
kaTTum kavalaiyaTrinid-Ongak-kaninda jnAla selavm vENDum


caraNam    buddhi selvam shuddhi selvam mutti selvam vENDum yOga siddhi selvam 
shakti selvam deiva selvamE vENDum jIvan uyyum selvam vENDumE
